text: Malika Haqq split from Jersey Shore vet Ronnie Ortiz - Magro in February after dating for two months. And at a recent press event for her new show, Famously Single, the best friend of Khloe Kardashian told People that the reality TV star was'aggressive.'' Ronnie and I are really, truly opposites,'Haqq, 34, said.'His love language is very aggressive. It ’ s verbally aggressive, it ’ s physically aggressive. It ’ s just the way he expresses himself.'Done : Malika Haqq split from Jersey Shore vet Ronnie Ortiz - Magro in February after dating for two months.
